author: Annie Ho
comment: Still my go to watch face

author: Brooke Johnson
comment: I've been wondering why anyone would download a analog watch face to a smart watch, this is a good alternative, still showing the seconds (which is the triangle increasing in size) with digital numbers, the text of which is big enough to glance at. I only wish there was an option to add the date. Cool design though, feels very modern while still holding on to elements of a classic watch face so it doesn't scream smart watch. I really like the color combinations as well.
title: Nice unique design

author: Mitchell Eaton
comment: Personalised colours would take this to a 5/5

reply.author: Airsource Ltd.
reply.content: Hi Mitchell, you should find the latest update (2.0.91) now let's you pick your own colours. enjoy!

title: Beautiful graphics but need some customisation!

author: Walter C.
comment: It would be nice to put some editing options in this app. Maybe even changing the font. I just expect more for a buck. Also one major problem with this watch face is the time isn't synced properly. Every other item says the correct time but this watch face. Always two mins behind. I change watch face and it catches up. Can that be fixed?

reply.author: Airsource Ltd.
reply.content: Hi Walter, thanks for the feedback and sorry to hear you're having an issue. We want to make Bermuda beautiful AND functional so it is important to eliminate issues like these. The problem occurs when the clock tries to animate while in the 'dimmed' mode. The latest update should fix this for you! Any more problems - don't hesitate to get in touch

title: Beautiful idea just some hiccups.

author: Sam Duke
comment: Lovely animations between seconds and as the app wakes and a lot of really nice colour-ways too. Currently using the 'Hardware' option.  One nice touch is the way the numbers slide out of each-others way as they approach so you can always read the time with the 'hour' to the left of the 'minute'
title: Super sleek and lots of options

author: Sjaak Broere
comment: It looks good, but cant properly test it as long as it uses the big notifications which take up half the screen. Please make this a setting or change it to small notifications.

reply.author: Airsource Ltd.
reply.content: Hi Sjaak, thanks for your feedback. Unfortunately, there is no way (yet) for custom watch faces to use the small notifications. As soon as there is we will get an update out. UPDATE: Bermuda is now updated to the official API and uses small, translucent notifications

title: Notifications cover screen

author: Robin Harris
comment: Would be better if the triangle is hollow on ambient mode, otherwise there's no burn in protection. Also would be good to have the animation be smooth rather than in ticks, and have the option to keep the screen on longer.

reply.author: Airsource Ltd.
reply.content: Thanks for the feedback! Re burn-in: the triangle moves such that no pixels are always occupied, reducing the risk of ghosting. But you're right - we could avoid blocks of colour. Re motion: We experimented with a number of 'tick' movements and found a compromise of a "smooth tick" felt best as it helped keep the feeling of a traditional timepiece

title: Good, except ambient mode
